org.jmisb.api.klv.st0805

Class SensorPointOfInterest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jmisb.api.klv.st0805.CotElement
      • org.jmisb.api.klv.st0805.CotMessage
        • org.jmisb.api.klv.st0805.SensorPointOfInterest

  • public class SensorPointOfInterest
extends CotMessage
    Represents a Sensor Point of Interest (SPI) CoT message.

    Every SPI message should be linked to a "parent" PlatformPosition UID/type identifying the platform producing the sensor feed.
